TI_TEXT.P: Materiale pentru instalaţii de apă şi canalizare

TITLE.P: T1376 — Framework for the Supply and Delivery of Plumbing Materials 2017

SHORT_DESCR.P: The Northern Ireland housing Executive (NIHE) is the Regional Strategic Housing Authority for Northern Ireland and invites Tenders for the establishment of a framework for the supply and delivery of plumbing materials. The framework will have a duration of 2 years.

The Northern Ireland housing Executive (NIHE) is the Regional Strategic Housing Authority for Northern Ireland and invites Tenders for the establishment of a framework for the supply and delivery of plumbing materials. The framework will have a duration of 2 years.
